org.apache.flink.runtime.instance

类 AkkaActorGateway

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.instance.AkkaActorGateway
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable, ActorGateway

    public class AkkaActorGateway
extends Object
implements ActorGateway, Serializable
    Concrete ActorGateway implementation which uses Akka to communicate with remote actors.
    另请参阅:

    • 方法详细资料

      • ask

        public scala.concurrent.Future<Object> ask(Object message,
                                           scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration timeout)
        Sends a message asynchronously and returns its response. The response to the message is returned as a future.
        指定者:
        ask 在接口中 ActorGateway
        参数:
        message - Message to be sent
        timeout - Timeout until the Future is completed with an AskTimeoutException
        返回:
        Future which contains the response to the sent message

      • tell

        public void tell(Object message)
        Sends a message asynchronously without a result.
        指定者:
        tell 在接口中 ActorGateway
        参数:
        message - Message to be sent

      • tell

        public void tell(Object message,
                 ActorGateway sender)
        Sends a message asynchronously without a result with sender being the sender.
        指定者:
        tell 在接口中 ActorGateway
        参数:
        message - Message to be sent
        sender - Sender of the message

      • forward

        public void forward(Object message,
                    ActorGateway sender)
        Forwards a message. For the receiver of this message it looks as if sender has sent the message.
        指定者:
        forward 在接口中 ActorGateway
        参数:
        message - Message to be sent
        sender - Sender of the forwarded message

      • retry

        public scala.concurrent.Future<Object> retry(Object message,
                                             int numberRetries,
                                             scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration timeout,
                                             scala.concurrent.ExecutionContext executionContext)
        Retries to send asynchronously a message up to numberRetries times. The response to this message is returned as a future. The message is re-sent if the number of retries is not yet exceeded and if an exception occurred while sending it.
        指定者:
        retry 在接口中 ActorGateway
        参数:
        message - Message to be sent
        numberRetries - Number of times to retry sending the message
        timeout - Timeout for each sending attempt
        executionContext - ExecutionContext which is used to send the message multiple times
        返回:
        Future of the response to the sent message

      • path

        public String path()
        Returns the ActorPath of the remote instance.
        指定者:
        path 在接口中 ActorGateway
        返回:
        ActorPath of the remote instance.

      • actor

        public akka.actor.ActorRef actor()
        Returns ActorRef of the target actor
        指定者:
        actor 在接口中 ActorGateway
        返回:
        ActorRef of the target actor

      • leaderSessionID

        public UUID leaderSessionID()
        从接口复制的说明: ActorGateway
        Returns the leaderSessionID associated with the remote actor or null.
        指定者:
        leaderSessionID 在接口中 ActorGateway
        返回:
        Leader session ID if its associated with this gateway, otherwise null
